project.name: lwe2006-sanfran
project.longname: Linux World Conference and Expo 2006 - San Francisco
project.description: This subproject is a place to hold information regarding the Gentoo booth at the 2006 Linux World Conference and Expo in San Francisco.
project.longdescription:
The 2006 Linux World Conference and Expo in San Francisco is one of the largest Linux events in the United States. It will be held on August 14th through the 17th at the Moscone Center in downtown San Francisco.
official website : http://www.linuxworldexpo.com/live/12/events/12SFO06A

ul.li: Provide a good overview of Gentoo's products
Foster relations with possible new partners
Speak with current partners to maintain relations

body.p:
This is the list of people related to this event:
Name Title Date of arrival Date of departure Travel information Email
Daniel Ostrow Gentoo Trustee n/a n/a n/a dostrow@gentoo.org

Chris Gianelloni Release Engieering August 12th August 19th Flight 301, US Airways - 9:59AM wolf31o2@gentoo.org
Josh Nichols Gentoo/Java ?? ?? ?? nichoj@gentoo.org

This is the list of stuff we need
Name Available Assigned to Description
CD-R media no ?? CD-R media to burn CDs on-demand on the booth
Gentoo Poster ?? dostrow Laminated Gento poster
Projector/Screen ?? dostrow Projector allows us to demo Gentoo for a wider audience
